data.text: “ ‘Panguva iyoyo, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha, mapfupa amadzimambo namachinda eJudha, namapfupa avaprista navaprofita, uye mapfupa avanhu veJerusarema, achabviswa kubva mumakuva avo.

Achava pamhene agorohwa nezuva uye achavhenekwa nomwedzi nenyeredzi dzose dzedenga, zvavakada vakazvishumira vakazvitevera uye vakabvunza kwazviri, vakazvinamata. Haangaunganidzwi kana kuvigwa, asi achafanana nomupfudze uri panyika.
Kwose zvako kwandichavadzingira, vakasara vose vorudzi urwu rwakaipa, vachademba rufu pachinzvimbo choupenyu, ndizvo zvinotaura Jehovha Wamasimba Ose.’
Zvino nemhaka yei ava vadzokera shure?
Naizvozvo ndichapa vakadzi vavo kuna vamwe varume,
Ko, vanonyadziswa netsika dzavo dzinonyangadza here?
“Tarirai ndichatumira nyoka dzino uturu pakati penyu,
Sezvo vanhu vangu vapwanyiwa, neniwo ndapwanyiwa;
Ko, muGireadhi hamuna muti webharisamu here?
